name: elevator-key
effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.
short_effect: Unlocks the elevator in Lysandre Labs.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A card key that activates the elevator in Lysandre Labs. It is emblazoned with Team Flare’s logo.
